description: This file is part of a web-based network management interface for parental control, specifically for adding a device to the list of allowed devices with configuration options including MAC address validation, scheduling, and UI interactions.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value from the device configuration.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Fetches parameter values for a specified object path, used here to retrieve device host information.

methods.name: getInstanceIDs
methods.description: Retrieves list of instance IDs for a specific object, used to iterate over device hosts.
